lom:description.lom:string:
Report of a convocation of the same title, sponsored by the National Academies, Center for Science, Mathematics, and Engineering Education.
DONALD KENNEDY, Chairman Bing Professor of Environmental Studies
Stanford University Stanford, California NAS, IOM
MELVIN D. GEORGE, Vice Chairman Professor of Mathematics.
University of Missouri Columbia, Missouri. The report is available for free in html format or for a fee in hard copy or pdf format.

lom:title.lom:string: From Analysis to Action: Undergraduate Education in Science, Mathematics, Engineering, and Technology
